english.segment1: We're all standing with our backs against the wall, Sooner or later. Waiting on a phone that never calls, at all. Heartbreak comes Rollin in like a storm, Sooner or later. Trying to swim but your sinking like a stone, Alone
english.segment2: and I can feel fire in the night. Waiting here. Baby its like we're. Walking on a wire thru the fear. Take my hand. We'll get there
english.segment3: Sooner or later I swear we're gonna make it, we're gonna make it, Sooner or later I swear we're gonna make it, we're gonna make it. Milk and honey till we get our fill. I'll keep chasing it I always will. Sooner or later I swear. We'll make it there. Sooner than later
english.segment4: We're all waiting on dream thats hard to own, Sooner or later. trying to feel the high without the low, you know
english.segment5: you can feel fire in the night. lying here. Baby its like we're. Walking on a wire thru the fear. Take my hand. We'll get there
english.segment6: the fear inside. the hills we've climbed. the tears this side of heaven. all these dreams inside of me. i swear were gonna get there
